about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Leading global health industry group integrating biotechnology, healthcare services, and modern commerce

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.content: We are a comprehensive health industry group focused on biotechnology R&D, healthcare services, and modern commerce. With over 20 years of industry experience, we have established a complete health industry ecosystem. Our business spans bio-immune therapy, stem cell storage, elderly care services, and modern commerce, serving millions of users across multiple countries and regions globally. The company is committed to improving human health and quality of life through continuous technological innovation and service optimization.

innovation.title: Innovation-Driven
innovation.description: Continuous technological innovation is the source of corporate development

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Providing excellent services with the highest quality standards

people.title: People-Oriented
people.description: Customers and employees are our most valuable assets

responsibility.title: Social Responsibility
responsibility.description: Actively fulfilling corporate social responsibility and giving back to society

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest company developments and industry insights

items.title: Company Awarded 'Global Health Industry Leader' Title
items.summary: At the 2025 Global Health Industry Summit, the company was awarded the 'Global Health Industry Leader' title for its outstanding achievements in biotechnology and healthcare services.

items.title: Major Breakthrough in Stem Cell Storage Technology
items.summary: Our research team successfully developed next-generation stem cell storage technology, improving storage efficiency by 40% and setting a new industry benchmark.

items.title: Overseas Market Expansion Advances
items.summary: The company established new R&D centers and service locations in Europe, further improving its global business layout.

items.title: Partnership with Leading Research Institutions
items.summary: The company signed strategic cooperation agreements with multiple well-known research institutions to jointly advance biotechnology development.

items.title: Launch of 'Healthy China' Public Welfare Project
items.summary: The company announced an investment of 100 million yuan to launch the 'Healthy China' public welfare project, providing free health services to remote areas.

items.title: Strategic Cooperation with International Top Medical Institutions
items.summary: The company signed strategic cooperation agreements with multiple internationally renowned medical institutions to jointly advance biomedical technology R&D.

items.title: Selected as 'Global Top 500 Most Innovative Companies' for Five Consecutive Years
items.summary: The company has been selected for the 'Global Top 500 Most Innovative Companies' list for five consecutive years due to continuous technological innovation and excellent market performance.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions and provide professional consultation services

overview.title: Business Overview
overview.content: Bio-immune therapy is an innovative treatment method utilizing the body's immune system to fight diseases. We have introduced the world's most advanced cellular immunotherapy technology to provide patients with safe, effective, and personalized treatment solutions. Our professional team includes internationally renowned immunology experts and clinical physicians dedicated to driving the development and application of bio-immune therapy technology.

technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.description: Adopting internationally leading cellular culture and modification technologies

team.title: Expert Team
team.description: Elite team composed of international immunology experts

safety.title: Safety Assurance
safety.description: Comprehensive quality control system ensuring treatment safety

personalized.title: Personalized Solutions
personalized.description: Customized treatment plans based on individual patient conditions

overview.title: Business Overview
overview.content: We provide professional stem cell collection, processing, and storage services, utilizing the world's most advanced cryopreservation technology to ensure the long-term viability and safety of stem cells. Our storage facilities meet international standards and employ comprehensive quality management systems. Through professional services, we help families preserve valuable health resources for the future.

technology.title: Advanced Equipment
technology.description: Utilizing internationally leading cryopreservation equipment and technology

standards.title: International Standards
standards.description: Storage facilities meet international certification standards

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: Comprehensive monitoring system ensuring storage safety

team.title: Professional Team
team.description: Experienced collection and storage specialist team

overview.title: Business Overview
overview.content: We provide comprehensive elderly care solutions integrating medical care, nursing, and rehabilitation. Our professional team is composed of senior nursing experts, rehabilitation therapists, and medical personnel, providing elderly individuals with comprehensive, professional, and caring services. Through the integration of smart technology and humanistic care, we are committed to creating a warm, comfortable living environment for the elderly.

medical.title: Medical Integration
medical.description: Deep integration of medical and nursing resources providing comprehensive health management

professional.title: Professional Care
professional.description: Professional nursing team providing 24-hour quality care services

rehabilitation.title: Rehabilitation Training
rehabilitation.description: Scientific rehabilitation programs helping elderly maintain physical function

smart.title: Smart Management
smart.description: Utilizing smart technology improving service efficiency and quality

overview.title: Business Overview
overview.content: We are committed to building a modern commercial ecosystem that integrates online and offline channels. Through innovative business models and quality service experiences, we provide consumers with convenient, high-quality shopping and lifestyle services. Our business covers retail, e-commerce, logistics, and other fields, forming a complete commercial service chain.
